CustomBehavior.Text: You must be Alliance to run this profile!

We are now accepting bug reports against the 90-100 portion of this pack. Please do NOT open new threads in the forum regarding bugs with these profiles--such threads will be deleted! Use Kick's Profiles thread!
Choose Corral or Tankworks. Profile chooses Tankworks after 5 minutes.\n\nYou can choose either, no difference in quests

CustomBehavior.Text:
No more Nagrand Quests until Horde 90-100 is complete. 
Yes, you read correctly. There are no more quests after this message. 

Don't post on forums and ask.

End of Dev Profile. Development from here. 
Yes, you read correctly. There are no more quests after this message.
